s.text: A Pentagon spokesman reached by the paper responds that academic examples of possible non-nerve-gas use are not examples of such actual commercial use.
A NYT editorial and an op-ed by the paper's Bob Herbert call for Mark McGwire to stop taking androstenedione, for the sake of the kids who watch his every move.

The Washington Post lead reports that Clinton's top political advisors have reached virtually unanimous agreement that he must say more publicly about his relationship with Monica Lewinsky, a tack so far resisted by the First Family.
